articles.description: All the news and reaction following the weekend's football, including Manchester City's 3-1 win at home to rivals United and Bournemouth's victory at Burnley.
articles.title: Football latest: Man City beat Man Utd in derby - reaction

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy explains why Manchester City forward Phil Foden's match-winning display in Sunday's Manchester derby was far from a one-off.
articles.title: How Foden became Guardiola's 'go-to man'

articles.description: Could Anthony Joshua v Francis Ngannou winner fight for the undisputed title next, despite a two-fight deal in place between champions Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk?
articles.title: Anthony Joshua v Francis Ngannou: Could winner fight for undisputed title next?

articles.description: The Boston Celtics thrash the Golden State Warriors 140-88 as they extend their winning streak to 11 games.
articles.title: NBA: Boston Celtics thrash Golden State Warriors for 11th straight win

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter recovers from a set down to beat Marta Kostyuk in the San Diego Open final.
articles.title: Katie Boulter beats Marta Kostyuk to win San Diego Open title

articles.description: Three thrilling three days of action at the World Athletics Indoor Championships in Glasgow have set Team GB up perfectly for the Olympics.
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Olympics in sights for Josh Kerr & Molly Caudery

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen move 10 points clear of Bayern Munich at the top of the Bundesliga following victory at 10-man Cologne.
articles.title: Alonso's Leverkusen win to go 10 points clear

articles.description: Marcus Smith returns to the England squad before their Six Nations match against Ireland after recovering from a calf injury.
articles.title: Smith returns to England squad after calf injury

articles.description: Ezra Mam's allegation overshadows a push for US audiences by Australia's National Rugby League.
articles.title: Ezra Mam: Australian rugby league star accuses rival of using racist slur

articles.description: Barcelona fail to capitalise on results elsewhere in La Liga as they stay third after a goalless draw at Athletic Bilbao.
articles.title: Barcelona stay third after draw at Athletic Bilbao
